docs.title: SKU Generator
docs.text:
SKU Generator is a simple tool that helps you automatically create clean, consistent Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) from your product data.

Instead of manually typing codes into spreadsheets, you can upload a product list and let SKU Generator build SKUs for you based on your chosen format.

It’s designed for sellers, store owners, and makers who want to save time, reduce errors, and keep their product catalogs organized across platforms like Shopify, Etsy, or Amazon.

docs.title: 📚 What's next?
docs.text: 👉 Getting Started – a guide to using SKU Generator.

docs.title: How to Create a SKU Format
docs.text: A SKU format is a simple recipe that tells the app how to build SKUs (Stock Keeping Units) from the columns in your CSV file. You don’t need to know programming — just follow the rules below.

docs.title: 1. Referencing Columns
docs.text:
Each column in your CSV can be referenced by a letter:

  • {A} = first column
  • {B} = second column
  • {C} = third column
  • …and so on.
  • After {Z}, it continues as {AA}, {AB}, {AC}…

docs.title: 2. Basic Format
docs.text:
You can combine text and column references inside braces { }.

{A}-{B}-{C}
  • If A = "Shirt" and B = "Red", the {A}-{B} SKU will be:
Shirt-Red

You can also add your own fixed text:

SKU-{A}-{B}

Gives:

SKU-Shirt-Red

docs.title: 3. Transformations
docs.text: You can apply transformations to change how the column text is used. Add them after a colon : inside the braces.

docs.title: Common Transformations
docs.text: Code Description Example Input Example Output 1-9 Trim {A:3} from Blue Long Trousers Blu C Consonants {A:C} from Blue Long Trousers BlLngTrsrs I Initials {A:I} from Blue Long Trousers BLT L Lowercase {A:L} from Blue Long Trousers blue long trousers P Pad to 3 chars (with 'X') {A:P} from M MXX 5P Trim and pad to n characters (with 'X') {A:5P} from M MXXXX Z Zero-pad number to 3 digits {A:4Z} from 42 042 5Z Zero-pad number to n digits {A:4Z} from 42 00042 S Slug (replace spaces/symbols with _) {A:S} from Blue Long Trousers blue_long_trousers U Uppercase {A:U} from Blue Long Trousers BLUE LONG TROUSERS W First word only {A:W} from Blue Long Trousers Blue

docs.title: 4. Combining Multiple Transforms
docs.text:
You can chain multiple transformations together:

{A:U3} → Uppercase, then take the first 3 letters

If A = "trousers", the result is:

TRO

docs.title: 5. Examples
docs.text: CSV Row (A=Name, B=Color, C=ID) Format Result Shirt, Red, 42 {A}-{B}-{C} Shirt-Red-42 Shirt, Red, 42 {A:U}-{B:U} SHIRT-RED Blue Long Trousers, Navy, 7 {A:I}-{B:3}-{C:3Z} BLT-Nav-007 Hat, Black, 1234 SKU-{C:5P} SKU-01234

docs.title: 6. Tips
docs.text:
• Always wrap column references in { }.
  • Use plain text outside braces for fixed words.
  • Combine transformations to shorten, clean, or format values.
  • If a column is empty, the SKU part will also be empty.

✅ With these rules, you can create SKU formats that match your business needs — simple or advanced!
